channel.title: CVE Feed for Check Point -- Check Point IPsec VPN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Check Point -- Check Point IPsec VPN

item.title: CVE-2019-8456|2024-08-04T21:17:31.589Z -- check%20point -- check%20point%20ipsec%20vpn
item.description: Check Point IKEv2 IPsec VPN up to R80.30, in some less common conditions, may allow an attacker with knowledge of the internal configuration and setup to successfully connect to a site-to-site VPN server.
